install.name: All Weblinks
install.author: John Bekker / C. Schneider
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: This module shows ALL weblinks on one page in columns or rowwise with lots of custom options. The weblinks will still be managed by Joomla!s integrated component.

param.name: Lcatids
param.label: Category id's
param.description: Specify here the id's of the categories to show/exclude (separated by comma)

param.name: Lexclude
param.label: Exclude id's
param.description: State if category id's inserted above shall be excluded (yes) or shown (no)!

param.name: LCorder
param.label: Category Sort order
param.description: Select the sortorder of categories

param.name: Lshowheader
param.label: Show category header
param.description: Display the category header text?

param.name: Lshownumlnk
param.label: Show number of links
param.description: Display the number of links in each category?

param.name: Lshowcdes
param.label: Show category description
param.description: Display the category description text?

param.name: Ldropdown
param.label: Use dropdown function
param.description: Use links dropdown (show and hide) function by clicking on the category-title?

param.name: Lcaticons
param.label: Category-icon (show)
param.description: If using the above dropdown-function: choose here a category-icon which will be displayd in front of the category-title to show (dropdown) the links. [place own icons in /images or media/M_images]

param.name: Lcaticonh
param.label: Category-icon (hide)
param.description: If using the above dropdown-function: choose here a category-icon which will be displayd in front of the category-title to hide the links again. [place own icons in /images or media/M_images]

param.name: Lorder
param.label: Link Sort order
param.description: Select were to sort on

param.name: Licon
param.label: Link-icon
param.description: Choose a link-icon which will be displayd in front of the weblink. [place icons (should not be larger than ~18x18) in /images or media/M_images]

param.name: Llengthoftitle
param.label: Length of title
param.description: Maximum number of characters before the linktitle is cut of.

param.name: Ldotaddlenght
param.label: Length to cut off
param.description: Number of characters to use when title has to be shortened.

param.name: Ltitlepopuptxt
param.label: Title popup text
param.description: When a title popup text is inserted here, it will be displayd for every link. If left blank, either the description- or the weblink-text is used as the popup title.

param.name: Lshowhits
param.label: Show hits
param.description: Display the number of hits?

param.name: Lshownew
param.label: Show new
param.description: Display if link is new?

param.name: Ldaysnew
param.label: Number of days link is new
param.description: Enter the number of day to show new link

param.name: Ltxtnew
param.label: Text to show on new links
param.description: Enter the text to shown on new links.

param.name: Lshowldes
param.label: Show link description
param.description: Display the link description text?

param.name: Lpopuplinks
param.label: Open in new window
param.description: Open the link in a new window?

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: e.g. leave blank for having just a list when using this module in a module position (categories with links below). When using the module within a content/article insert (if desired): _lnkcols for having the links in colums below the categories, or insert: _catcols for having the categories in e.g. colums (links below it in one column)
